New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded 27 points, 16 rebounds, and 9 assists, just one rebound shy of a triple-double
Key Match Events: Denver Nuggets pulled away in the third quarter with Nikola Jokic scoring 18 points in that period
The Nuggets led by 17 points after a three-pointer by Julian Strawther early in the first quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Utah Jazz were missing key players Lauri Markkanen and Jordan Clarkson, starting rookies Cody Williams and Kyle Filipowski
Denver Nuggets started Russell Westbrook in place of Jamal Murray, who was in concussion protocol
Post-Match Reflections: Denver Nuggets secured their first home win of the season
Utah Jazz remained winless after the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was notable for the Jazz's winless streak and the Nuggets' first home victory
Both teams had significant player absences impacting their performance
